entry.title: New release for Eigenfocus: v0.6.0 - Public Release - Ready for daily usage
entry.content:
If this is your first time

üëã Hi.This is our first public/announced release with Projects, Boards, Issues, Time Tracking and Themes.

  • Projects: create/edit/update/archive you projects
  • Boards: each project has a board where you can customize columns to your workflow
  • Issues: create issues using the project board
  • Workflow with Boards: Move issues between columns
  • Time Tracking: track time spent on a Project and a Specific Issue
  • Time Report: generate time reports by project and time periods

Check our blog post to understand a little bit more about our vision and to see some screenshots:

https://eigenfocus.com/blog/articles/eigenfocus-first-public-release-self-hosted-project-time-team-management-app

For alpha testers

If you're using from a previous alpha/testing release, today we're adding features for a better experience using Boards and Tracking Time. The overalll experience should be good for you to use Eigenfocus on a daily basis.

  • Issues (Board Cards) accepts multiple file uploads with preview for images
  • Auto saving when editing Issue title
  • Improvements on card drag/drop between columns
  • You can inline create a new card/issue on boards so you can quickly add many cards
  • Showing informative icons on cards (if has any description of files)
  • Better UX for navigating between time tracking and boards
  • Create a new issue with a keyboard shortcut
  • Listing projects boards on sidebar menu

entry.title: New release for Eigenfocus: v0.7.0 - A lot of quality of life improvements
entry.content:
Hey! üëã

This release brings a lot of improvements to make our experience smoother and more cohesive.

The full list with changes, screenshots and future plans are in our blog:

https://eigenfocus.com/blog/articles/we-believe-in-what-we-re-building-release-0-7-0

We hope you like it!

üìù Quick Summary

  • Optional HTTP Basic Auth
  • UI/UX Enhancements for Boards:
  • New "Create Column" button for faster organization.
  • Smooth animations and auto-scroll to newly created columns.
  • Auto-adjusting card height when adding to boards.
  • Semantic and Friendly Issue URLs
  • Dynamic page titles
  • Time Tracking UI improvements
  • Save entries with CTRL/CMD + Enter.
  • Board and Issue links from time entries.

üí´ Coming Soon

  • Issue List: helps with bigger projects
  • Focus Space: a dedicated spot for thoughts, todos, timers and focus.
  • Enhanced Time Tracking: alerts for long running timers, more integration with issues and boards
